summary: WHILE DRIVING AT ANY SPEED THE ABS BRAKE LIGHT AND THE 4 WHEEL DRIVE LIGHT ILLUMINATED.  CONSUMER STATED THAT AS A RESULT THE VEHICLE WAS STUCK IN THE SNOW.    *NLM  WHEN THE ABS IS NOT WORKING PROPERLY, THE VEHICLE WILL NOT BRAKE SAFELY, AND THE FOUR/ALL WHEEL DRIVE WILL NOT WORK.  THE VEHICLE WILL NOT HAVE THE TRACTION TO GO UP A HILL.  ( ABS AND ALL WHEEL DRIVE WOULD FAIL AT ANY TIME)  SCC
